entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
